bool  selectionOnly,
double  t0,
double  t1,
MixerSpec *  mixerSpec = NULL,
Tags *  metadata = NULL,
int  subformat = 0 
) [virtual]
Parameters:
subformat Control whether we are doing a "preset" export to a popular file type, or giving the user full control over libsndfile. Set to 0 (default) gives full control, 1 gives 16-bit AIFF, 2 gives 16-bit WAV 3 gives a GSM 6.10 WAV file
